thread.title: #FightFor15? Not at Vox where the hourly wage for interns comes up short
thread.title_full: #FightFor15? Not at Vox where the hourly wage for interns comes up short

author: Greg P.
title: #FightFor15? Not at Vox where the hourly wage for interns comes up short
text:
#FightFor15? Not at Vox where the hourly wage for interns comes up short Posted at 1:36 pm on March 21, 2017 by Greg P. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Vox is hiring interns you guys: Vox's editorial interns are treated as junior members of our staff. Apply for our summer program here: https://t.co/iUnFQvRzNq 
Paid internships, mind you, but not at the $15/hour rate we’ve been told by liberals won’t affect profits at companies: @voxdotcom are they paid a living wage? $15+/hr? 
— Josh Fields (@partiallypro) March 21, 2017 Trending
